name: Grand Delta Angels
overview:
BIG DELTA ANGELS created in December 2007 is a network of nearly forty individual investors called “Business Angels” involved in business creation.

The GDA network-affiliated FRANCE ANGELS, has joined its code of ethics. Network members are qualified accredited investor. A Business Angel is an individual who invests part of its heritage in an innovative SMEs which is freely available to the contractor’s expertise, experience, networks and relationships that a portion of his time.

Business Angels Network all have solid business experience as entrepreneurs, executives of large groups or professions. Have a serious investment capacity, they are motivated by the financial incentive for investment but even more pleased to be associated with birth and growth of innovative companies.
